column5: Another Awesome report! Congrats on your PB. Its a real hog!!!Thanks for sharing.
Gotta love those small urban water bodies. Much tougher to catch a big bass there than in a huge lake.  My hat's still off to the wife!
Congrats on your PB.  Nice carp and great report.
Don't sweat it Rich, soon Splenda will be outfishing you too. Might as well get used to it  .
Ah take it like a man Rich. She spanked ya bud. Real nice hog SP.
Nice bass, should take BBR long to throw out the pizza boxes and empty cans of Busch !
Did you guys row over there, or did you just turn around and cast over.  Nice bass for the mrs.
What a great report Sugarpacket.  That is a very impressive bass  I hope Rich had to scrub some pots and pans at least  Joey

Great report, and congrats on your PB.    Sure would like to see a picture of Rick doing a pile of dishes, say Thanksgiving or Christmas dinner  :whistling:  BBR, maybe with your record, you should not be making bets, 'cause she's gonna kick your  John
Nice Bucket, that thing is a serious hog.  Congrats on winning the bet, an awsome read.  Thanks
